name: Snakes And Stairs
description: Your objective is to move your piece to the end of the level, you do this by getting random dice numbers and moving your piece by the same amount of that number like a classical snake and ladders game, you can also save dice rolls to be used later.  Also beware of stopping on top of the snakes as it might lead to losing progress in the level and falling of the tiles will lead to restarting the whole level.
